Text: =| I would be fine with bad angle and bad quality... but really 30mins? Did the recorder like rage quit half way thru? Or like have to pee in the middle...

Damn it! Been waiting for this, I could live with the shit quality... But what happened to the rest? :(

this thing is not worth the download. The camera seems to be hidden somewhere on the seat and so you can't see more than a quarter of the screen. 

This isn't just crap quality, it's unwatchable.
It's legit and the quality is GOOD EXPECT the angle is horrible... only 15% or so of the screen is visible, I'm hoping for a good recordings from upcoming weekend ;]

I'm sorry for the crap quality. I found a leak and noticed it was legit, so I uploaded it here. I'm pretty sure a better copy will be uploaded on the weekend. I can't believe I actually want to watch this, damn hiatus!

or how about you people do what i did, spent the money and watch this IN THEATERS! Heck i saw it TWICE!

hey radiored you do know that the movie is in limited release and most the country can not just go see it even if we wanted to.

radiored : I would love to... but besides of movie ticket, I would have to buy a ticket for a plane from Europe to North America and back. That would be mighty overkill. I dont want to wait for DVD.

And whenever I download movie from torrent and end up liking it, I buy it on DVD later, to be fair to those, who make quality movies. 
I have a decent collection of DVDs...
As much as I would rather go and see this instead of torrenting it, it doesn't hit cinemas in my country until the 24th of August! ;_;
Whatever happened to the versions given out for press purposes only?  Considering any twat with a blog can be treated like a member of the media's harem, I'm surprised we don't all have this already.
